name: EIT Food RisingFoodStars
description: EIT Food RisingFoodStars, co-funded by the European Union, is a leading accelerator dedicated to scaling innovative agri-food solutions that enhance food sovereignty, sustainability, and waste reduction across Europe. The program provides startups with workshops, mentorship, and access to an extensive network of investors and industry leaders. With alumni having commercialized 33 innovations and secured over €870M in investments, RisingFoodStars is driving transformative change in the agri-food sector, advancing innovations in alternative proteins, sustainable packaging, and net-zero food systems.
investmentAreas: agri-food, sustainable packaging, net-zero food systems

name: Seven Camp
description: Brussels-based tech accelerator program. 3 months of acceleration for tech startups in AI, dual-use technology and cybersecurity. MedTech welcome starting next cohort. Our portfolio: https://seven.camp/portfolio
investmentAreas: Dual use, AI, Cybersecurity, Edtech, Legaltech, Medtech

name: Ethias Ventures
description: Ethias Ventures is the venture capital arm of Ethias group. Investing in innovative start-ups relevant in insurance ecosystem is our leitmotif. Beyond investments, we create partnership opportunities with Ethias insurance business to accelerate your growth. Because we believe in win-win investments ! We are currently looking for European start-ups, with visible traction, and scale-ups in InsurTech and in the ecosystems related to insurance : Mobility, Health and Property. With Ethias Ventures, you can rely on our rich expertise and strong position in Belgian insurance market : • #1 Direct Insurer with 1.2 Mios B2C customers, 46.5K B2B customers (#1 public sector), • financial strength : Fitch rating A (May 2022).

name: QBIC Fund
description: Qbic is a seed and early-stage venture capital fund supporting spin-offs and start-ups that valorize research from Qbic's knowledge partners. Qbic is one of the largest spin-off funds in Europe managing €190 million in resources over the different funds. Qbic I launched in 2012 and has finalized its portfolio of 18 ventures; Qbic II launched in 2017 and has a portfolio of 19 ventures, and Qbic III launched in 2022 and is currently building its portfolio.

name: Miles Ahead Capital
description: Miles Ahead is a Venture Studio helping first-time founders of Deep Tech & AI startups grow faster by ‘producing’ and funding their business in an empowering environment. Our name is inspired by the Miles Davis album. Just like great music, successful ventures are built through a combination of individual talent and strong team chemistry.

name: Finindus
description: Finindus is a Belgium based investment company funded by ArcelorMittal and the Flemish Region and is linked to OCAS, a world class metals research centre near Ghent (Belgium). Since 2006, Finindus provides early stage and growth financing (both equity and debt) to innovative technology companies active in the field of materials, sustainable manufacturing and industry 4.0. Finindus invests across Europe and North-America, with Flanders as our home base and sweet spot.

name: Crescent Ventures
description: Crescent Ventures develops and delivers dependable, secure, and environmentally friendly Internet of Things solutions for smart buildings, smart cities, industry 4.0, and smart energy applications around the world. They enable and accelerate the transition to a safer, more sustainable, and more comfortable living environment, allowing businesses to thrive. The group is organized along 3 business units: Crescent IoT Solutions, Crescent Lighting and Crescent Ventures.
investmentAreas: Wireless Services, IoT, Internet of Things, Investors, Sustainable

name: Aliaxis Next
description: Aliaxis Next is an impact business builder division of Aliaxis. We are Aliaxis Next, a team of business builders who identify, engage, and accelerate water tech companies and entrepreneurs through our four business units: Sustainable Water Management, Access to Water, Resilient Water Infrastructure, and Water for Food. As a world leader in fluid management solutions, we are investing at pace in the technologies we will need to solve the immense water challenges of the future. And we’re laying the foundations for our continued growth beyond 2025.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Lab Box
description: Lab Box is a great Belgian start-up studio focusing on the future of mobility. Lab Box has the ambition to promote and develop new mobility solutions that will make cities more liveable and enjoyable in the future.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Sparkalis
description: Sparkalis is a newly created corporate venture arm of the PURATOS GROUP.Sparkalis, a corporate venture arm of Puratos Group, invests in innovative technologies to create a healthier food print for future generations, collaborating with entrepreneurs to transform ideas into successful businesses.
investmentAreas: FoodTech, Entrepreneurs, Investment, Venture Capital, Private Equity Principals

name: UCB Ventures
description: UCB Ventures is a €150 million strategic corporate venture fund. UCB is a global biopharmaceutical company focused on neurology and immunology disorders, driven by innovative science to enhance patient lives worldwide. We work closely and forge strong connections with patients, caregivers, health care professionals and other stakeholders who know the challenges of these diseases and where the unmet needs are found all too well.
investmentAreas: Neurology, Immunology, Healthcare Innovation, Pharmaceutical Manufacturing

name: FF2032
description: FF2032 is a Corporate Venture Capital Fund powered by Lotus Bakeries investing in later stage ventures within the food sector. FF2032 is Lotus Bakeries’ corporate venture fund focused on the broader food & drinks space. We provide minority growth equity to support top-notch entrepreneurs to significantly scale their business.
investmentAreas: FoodTech, Innovative products, Technologies, Investment, Sustainability, Entrepreneur
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: VERSO Capital
description: Dedicated independent Merchant Banking Boutique and UHNW Advisory firm, founded by a former Swiss Private Banker. Exclusively working with international UHNW and Institutional Clients on transactions of at least USD 100mio. Verso Capital is a boutique merchant banking and financial services firm with its headquarters in Luxembourg, in Europe. Exclusively catering to pre-selected Institutional, Corporate and UHNW Client Accounts.
investmentAreas: Clean Energy, CleanTech, EdTech, Enterprise Software, Financial Services
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Aliaxis Ventures
description: Aliaxis Ventures operates as a venture arm of Aliaxis group.Aliaxis is a global leader in advanced piping systems providing sustainable solutions for water and energy challenges worldwide.
investmentAreas: Plastics, Plastic pipes, fittings, Marine, Mining

name: EIB Global
description: EIB Global is the arm of the European Investment Bank for activities outside the European Union. EIB Global supports climate action, economic growth, and development.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: FNX Ventures
description: Venture capital firm partnering at (pre)seed stage with entrepreneurs in Benelux, France, and Germany active in (cyber)security, protection tech, dual technologies, and new materials. FNX has been launched by FN Browning Group (a leading company in the defence sector) and Wallonie Entreprendre (a financial holding company and Venture Capital tech investor). At FNX, it's not just about financial investment. The fund is committed to empowering startups with a comprehensive support system. Leveraging FN Browning Group's deep technical know-how and cutting-edge technological expertise, it offers startups unparalleled access to markets, key customer insights, and the latest business trends.
investmentAreas: Cyber Security, Dual Tech, Protection Tech, Safety Tech

name: PARSEC Accelerator
description: PARSEC Accelerator provides start-ups and SMEs with the necessary resources to develop and launch new Earth Observation based products. The comprehensive acceleration programme is offering a total of €2.5 Million euro equity-free funding, alongside coaching, training and market entry support. The accelerator focuses on three emerging sectors.
investmentAreas: Professional Services, Training, Education, Coaching, Funding

name: Novalis Biotechnology Incubation
description: Novalis Biotech Incubation is an early-stage venture capital fund that invests in biotechnology and life sciences related companies. Focusing on enabling technologies in healthcare, such as digital health, diagnostics, genomics and bio-informatics. We focus on early-stage start-ups, from (pre-)seed stage to series A, and support their evolution by providing funding, sharing our professional and academic connections, and help to shape the business strategy in order to create value for all stakeholders.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology, Life Science, Venture Capital, Biotechnology, Financial Services

name: symbIoTe
description: Targeting IoT platform owners to join the symbIoTe ecosystem. symbIoTe (symbiosis of smart objects across IoT environments) proposes an Open Source IoT interoperability middleware to remedy the fragmented IoT market. This middleware provides an abstraction layer for a “unified view” on various platforms and their resources so that platform resources are transparent to application designers and developers.
investmentAreas: Internet of Things, Interoperability, Middleware, IT Services, IT Consulting

name: Lab Box
description: Lab Box is a great Belgian start-up studio focusing on the future of mobility. Lab Box has the ambition to promote and develop new mobility solutions that will make cities more liveable and enjoyable in the future. Belgium is one of the most congested countries in the world. This is one of the reasons why Lab Box decided to make this small but complex piece of land its living laboratory.
investmentAreas: Information Technology, SaaS, Software, Mobility, Automotive

name: Industrya
description: Industrya is a hands-on investment fund that operates exclusively in the Industry 4.0, energy and new materials sectors. We are a hands-on investment fund that invests in industrial start-ups and scale-ups by giving them access to a national and international network of technical and financial expertise, markets, customers and industrial partners. We invest in the bold and innovative start-ups that shape industry and the world of tomorrow.
investmentAreas: Industry 4.0, Energy, New materials, Funds, Trusts

name: Hartwood
description: Hartwood is a multi-specialist consulting group, accelerating the growth of its companies. Partner & Business Accelerator Group of entrepreneurs and ecosystem of innovative companies. We support extraordinary entrepreneurs, women and men who invent a better future. We develop remarkable projects and accelerate French companies to make them the leaders of tomorrow.
investmentAreas: Consulting, Professional Services, Entrepreneurship, Financing, FinTech

name: IHUB
description: iHub.eu is an Internet Innovation Network of accelerators. iHub gives space to technology startups. Located in the centre of Ghent, Belgium, iHub is an inspiring place where startups grow, innovate, connect and have fun doing so. Funky office space and co-working space available.
investmentAreas: Office space, Startups, Technology, Information, Internet

name: imec
description: Research center in nanoelectronics. Imec is a world-leading R&D and innovation hub in nanoelectronics and digital technologies. At times, we shape the future. Founded in 1984, imec quickly made its name as the leading research hub for advanced CMOS scaling. We will continue to shape the roadmap for the semiconductor industry for years to come.
investmentAreas: R&D, Nanoelectronics, Life sciences, Photovoltaics, Wireless communications

name: imec
description: Research center in nanoelectronics. Imec is a world-leading R&D and innovation hub in nanoelectronics and digital technologies. At times, we shape the future. Founded in 1984, imec quickly made its name as the leading research hub for advanced CMOS scaling. We will continue to shape the roadmap for the semiconductor industry for years to come.
investmentAreas: R&D, Nanoelectronics, Life sciences, Photovoltaics, Wireless communications

name: imec.istart
description: The first investor and supporting partner to scale tech startups, ranked the no.1 accelerator linked to the University by UBI Global. Committed to supporting digital innovation and entrepreneurship in Belgium, the imec.istart business acceleration program supports entrepreneurs during the early development phase of their tech startup. This incubation takes a minimum of 12 months and is meant to assess the feasibility of the business proof-of-concept, prepare the (commercial) launch of the first product(s) and establish the startup to drive this commercialization together with the imec.istart corporate partners.

name: Impact Shakers
description: Impact Shakers is an impact ecosystem tackling societal and environmental challenges through inclusive entrepreneurship. Impact Shakers is a global impact ecosystem beating the odds. Our mission is to tackle complex societal challenges through inclusive entrepreneurship. We do this by working with entrepreneurs & investors. We innovate financing & tools and lobby for policy changes to create systemic change
investmentAreas: Program Development, Entrepreneurship, Investors, Innovate, Financing

name: Incubaid
description: Incubator focused primarily on helping to change our planet for the better through technology that supports decentralization. We believe doing good for the world and doing business can go hand in hand. We are building companies which will help to achieve an ambituous global goal. Make it possible for everyone in the world to have unlimited access to Education, Sustainable Internet, and Complementary Digital Currencies for less than 1% of their monthly salary.

name: Boot Ventures
description: Boot Ventures is a startup studio based in Brussels that focuses on solving real-world problems with technology. Boot Ventures is a startup studio and seed stage venture capital company based in Brussels that focuses on solving real-world problems with technology. As the name "Boot Ventures"​ indicates, our main activity is to bootstrap ventures.

name: B-Sprouts
description: B-Sprouts is an international Incubator and Accelerator. Co-founded in 2016 by Hugo Hanselmann and Florence Hoevers, B-Sprouts is based in Brussels at the heart of Europe. B-Sprouts aims to be a leading start-up program to foster a proactive community of international entrepreneurs and help launch successful start-up ventures.
investmentAreas: Start-up Incubation, Start-up Acceleration, Innovation Consultancy, Venture Capital

name: Beangels
description: Beangels is a Financial Services Industry. We connect brilliant entrepreneurs with experienced investors. With over 25 years of experience and more than 480 active members, BeAngels has built one of the largest European networks of business angels. Through several investment plans, the network supports future Belgian and European start-ups at different stages of development and helps investors with varied profiles .

name: Biotope
description: Biotope is an incubator program for startups with impactful ideas in agri-food biotechnology. Biotope by VIB is an incubator program for impact agrifood biotech startup teams looking to impact people’s lives through innovation. Based in Flanders, we offer a stimulating environment where the leaders of tomorrow can strengthen both their business skills and technology in a personalized journey.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology Researc, Investment, Financial Services, Agriculture

name: BlueHealth Innovation Center
description: BlueHealth Innovation Center is driving the digital transformation of healthcare for Students. We support HealthTech entrepreneurs from the start. BlueHealth Innovation Center, acquired by imec.istart, stimulates innovation in healthcare through a 12-week support program where HealthTech entrepreneurs are prepared for their first investment.

name: Junction Growth Investors
description: They are an investment fund dedicated solely to energy transition. Their team is a junction of former entrepreneurs and investment professionals. They take on the challenges and complexities of energy transition shoulder to shoulder with entrepreneurs and founders.

name: White Fund
description: White Fund is a Belgian medtech venture capitalist fund. Founded in 2019, it aims to support the pre-market stages of projects and the launch of sales, with an exit target of 5-8 years. The fund has a size of EUR 38 million, in order to finance about 10 projects. Investors in the fund include Business Angels, SFPI-FPIM, Invest For Jobs, Finance&Invest.Brussels, Noshaq, Ogeo Fund, Solidaris and CHU de Liège.

name: Agri Investment Fund
description: Agri Investment Fund (AIF) is the private equity and venture capital fund of the group Boerenbond (Farmer’s Union) focusing on Ag-Tech and Agro-Food companies that contribute to a more sustainable agriculture and horticulture.

name: Viralety Ventures
description: Viralety is an adventure capital fund that invests in aspiring and passionate entrepreneurs with disruptive ideas determined to build companies with long-term worth. They aim to be a strong strategic partner throughout the first difficult steps of a startup's journey by investing mostly seed or even pre-seed capital for startup R&D, product development, and expansion while providing strategic guidance.
investmentAreas: Agnostic, Fin-Tech, SaAS, Marketplace, Med-Tech, Deep-Tech

name: Water Lemon Ventures
description: Waterlemon Ventures is a family-backed venture capital fund investing in the most ambitious climate innovations. They invest in early-stage startups that demonstrate outstanding team dynamics, show acute market mastery, and develop scalable and innovative technology for the future.
investmentAreas: Ag-Tech, Bio-Tech, Clean-Tech, Food and Beverage, SaaS

name: Lean FUND
description: Lean FUND is a privately held seed and early stage investment fund managed by experienced entrepreneurs. On top of their first-round investment, they provide coaching from their integrated Lean REACTOR. Their vision is to spark a chain reaction of European innovation and fuel entrepreneurship from their base camp in Belgium.

name: Novalis Biotechnology Incubation
description: Novalis Biotech is an early-stage venture capital investor in life sciences. They welcome innovative concepts in healthcare and aim to support their development from the state of incorporation. Their investment focus is on “enabling technologies” in life sciences. They strongly believe in capital-light platform technology and close interaction with customers early in the life of the company. Focus areas include innovative research and manufacturing tools, bioinformatics, genomics, diagnostics, and digital health.

name: PMV
description: PMV provides venture capital – always in co-financing with the market – both at an early stage and to more mature companies. This may range from limited tickets – often in as convertible subordinated loans – to large capital tickets. PMV is different from many other capital providers. It has no pre-determined exit date and can therefore spend years working with your company to build its future. Moreover, it is an active but patient investor. PMV will try to meet your financing needs in the best possible way, taking into account both your needs and those of other stakeholders.
investmentAreas: Enterprise Software, Bio-Tech, Artificial Intelligence, IoT

name: Verlinvest
description: At Verlinvest they are passionate about growing brands that shine a light on issues and drive better consumption habits. They use patient, permanent capital to build businesses for the long-term. They invest across three core strategies: Growth, Platform, and Venture (via V3 Ventures).
investmentAreas: Food and Beverage, Health Care, Lifestyle, Consumer-Tech, FMCG

name: Ninepointfive
description: A venture capital fund with 35 mio Euro under management. A focused portfolio of corporate ventures built and accelerated with leading corporations. Governed at arms-length, but coached close to the heart: we share all the risks, upsides, and challenges of our ventures. They are independent, based on an equity partnership.
investmentAreas: B2B SaaS, Food-Tech, Augmented Reality, Clean-Tech, Consumer

name: EIT Digital Accelerator
description: They embody the future of innovation by mobilizing a pan-European multi-stakeholder open-innovation ecosystem of top European corporations, SMEs, startups, universities, and research institutes. Within this ecosystem, students, researchers, engineers, business developers, and investors address the technology, talent, skills, business, and capital needs of digital entrepreneurship. They build the next generation of digital ventures, products, and services, and nurture digital entrepreneurial talent. They help businesses and entrepreneurs stay at the frontier of digital innovation by providing them with technology, talent, and growth support.

name: Project Rise
description: As go-to strategic coaches with deep knowledge in driving robust concepts through go-to-market, product, tech innovation, and operations, they empower entrepreneurs in making fast informed decisions and finding the missing pieces of the puzzle. As investors, they bring their own capital and open access to their inner circle of trust to complete larger funding rounds.

name: Impact Shakers
description: Impact Shakers are committed to building a more inclusive and diverse entrepreneurial ecosystem. Although talent may be equally distributed, opportunity is not. They focus on empowering the underestimated.

name: Lab Box
description: They are building the future of mobility. Lab Box is focusing on the future of mobility with the ambition to develop new solutions that make mobility seamless and sustainable again and support them in their growth.
investmentAreas: Information Technology, SaaS, Software, Mobility, Clean-Tech

name: Limburgse Reconversie Maatschappij
description: LRM is a venture capitalist providing smart money, giving companies the necessary oxygen for growth. Additionally, they manage three business campuses and offer opportunities for entrepreneurs seeking industrial estates. On the former mine sites be-MINE and Terhills, they are accomplishing impressive transformations.
investmentAreas: Biotechnology, CleanTech, Life Science, Prop-Tech, Deep-Tech

name: TCD Capital (ex TheClubDeal)
description: At TCD Capital, from their offices in Brussels and Antwerp, Belgium, they don’t just invest in scale-ups; they invest in visions that redefine industries. As a premier venture capital fund, their ethos is grounded in nurturing the extraordinary potential of Series A scale-ups and guiding them through the pivotal transformations that shape their futures.

name: Saffelberg Investments
description: Saffelberg Investments is an independent investment company with a 400 million EUR capital base. They focus on long-term investments by taking substantial minorities in fast-growing ventures through risk-bearing capital. Active across the globe, they participate in corporations operating in diverse sectors through equity and/or mezzanine financing. In recent years, Artificial Intelligence, Internet-of-Things, and Life Sciences have become key focus areas. Saffelberg Investments aims to accelerate company growth, create value, and provide better returns to entrepreneurs and all stakeholders. Therefore, they not only offer capital but also executive support and valuable expertise in many areas.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, E-Commerce, IoT, Industry 4.0, SaaS, Med-Tech, Agnostic

name: Akiles
description: They created Akiles to provide long-term support to high-performing entrepreneurs in the development of their companies. They focus on growth capital, making minority investments in private companies seeking capital to expand their business, enter new markets, or finance acquisitions. They also help founders diversify their wealth in owner buyout transactions.

name: Monus
description: They are an independent investment firm with a 15 Mio capital base that supports entrepreneurs and managers to accomplish their growth ambitions. They are passionate about growing through innovation, disrupting the market, and having fun.
investmentAreas: Agnostic, SaaS, Event Management, Marcom, Digital

name: Entourage
description: They invest in early stage B2B SaaS, prioritizing partnerships with strong founding teams that demonstrate initial traction. They can do tickets from €300K up to €2M and generally move fast. Hands-on when asked, sharing advice when needed, understanding when it is decided to ignore it all.
investmentAreas: B2B SaaS, Artificial Intelligence, Fin-Tech, SaaS

name: ForsVC
description: By combining their expertise, networks, and resources, they create value and will take companies to the next level! While their focus is on the Belgian games industry, companies from The Netherlands, France, and Germany can also apply.
investmentAreas: Gaming, Augmented Reality, Virutal Reality, Metaverse

name: imec.istart Future Fund
description: Independent early-stage venture capital fund dedicated to empowering exceptional companies within (primarily) the imec.istart ecosystem. Their focus is on partnering with visionary entrepreneurs and innovative startups to accelerate their journey from potential to success.

name: Fortino Capital
description: Fortino is a leading B2B software venture capital and growth equity firm with offices in Antwerp, Amsterdam, and Munich. They leverage their international network, C-level, and entrepreneurial experience to help European SaaS companies scale faster and more sustainably than the competition.
investmentAreas: Insur-Tech, SaaS, Sales Automation, Telecommunications, Logistics

name: Gimv
description: Gimv is a European investment company listed on Euronext Brussels. As a recognized market leader, they partner with entrepreneurial and innovative companies in five forward-looking investment areas. They currently manage a portfolio of around 60 companies with a combined turnover of EUR 4.0 billion and more than 20,000 employees.

name: SmartFin
description: Smartflin Targets exceptional B2B technology companies across Europe. As an entrepreneur, you need financial support for your venture, clear-cut feedback, and relevant guidance from those who've gone before you. That's exactly what they offer.

name: Nausicaa Ventures
description: Nausicaa Ventures combines the best of institutional venture capital groups and individual investors. It aims to cover the equity gap faced by most, promising early stage companies on their path towards profitable growth. Nausicaa Ventures has the resources, knowledge, experience and agility to respond to the financial and management needs of those companies, and to work side-by-side with them towards the achievement of successful exits.

name: Cleverton Ventures
description: Cleverton invests in tech companies with disruptive potential. They focus on FinTech, InsurTech, HealthTech, and FoodTech. Join them in investing in the future. Together, they aim to drive innovation and create lasting impact.

name: The CoFoundry
description: With a passion for innovation, they help entrepreneurs transform their ideas into sustainable companies by funding them at seed stage and coaching them in the growth process. They aim for the long run rather than a fast monetary return. Some say they cut through the funding hype and work hard to give businesses a sustainable future.

name: Media Invest Flanders
description: PMV and VRT join forces and expertise to jointly invest in promising companies in the Flemish media ecosystem. They are setting up a joint venture to support new initiatives (mainly financially) and to grow the sector. Developing a profitable investment portfolio to support and strengthen the professionalization and international potential of the Flemish media sector: that is our mission.

name: Lumiares
description: Lumiares proactively pursues the most promising digital health opportunities which it funds and supports from the incubation phase onwards. In addition to its internal team, it leverages a strong network of external clinical, technological and business experts to validate innovative digital health solutions and accelerate their time-to-market. Lumiares helps them develop a strong value proposition and scalable business model with clear benefits to patients, care givers and payers.

name: Sopartec
description: Sopartec's mission, within the Louvain Technology Transfer Office (LTTO), is to transfer the results of research carried out by UCLouvain, the Cliniques universitaires St-Luc (CUSL), the CHU UCL Namur and the Institute de Duve (ICP) to the public/market by creating spin-offs and negotiating licence agreements. Sopartec is working with the VIVES Investment Funds (VIVES). The VIVES Funds are technology multi-sectorial funds that invest in UCLouvain spin-offs and startups in both Belgium and neighboring countries.

name: Cascara Ventures
description: Cascara is committed to building successful businesses through effective partnerships with outstanding entrepreneurs. They invest only in areas where they have domain expertise. They prefer to act as lead investor and take a board seat, providing strategic, operational, and financial advice. They bring insights and advantages from their large network of relationships in the industry. They are long-term investors and believe in adding value by working together with portfolio company management teams to help build market-leading companies.

name: Comate Ventures
description: Comate Ventures is a pre-seed fund with a 100% focus on hardware startups. With this fund, they aim to leverage brilliant early-stage ideas to become the next big thing.

name: Nivelinvest
description: The primary mission of Invest.BW is to sustainably support prosperity and entrepreneurial dynamism in Walloon Brabant. Invest.BW intervenes financially over the time horizon agreed together alongside entrepreneurs who will positively impact our province and in line with the economic, environmental and societal development desired for Wallonia. It aims for a fair return commensurate with the risk taken.

name: Airborn
description: Airborn is a collective of impact-driven angel investors providing the capital, knowhow, and network to accelerate planet-first ventures. They exist to help impact founders reach market traction faster and support them on their journey to solve some of today's biggest societal challenges.

name: Torus Capital
description: They are active entrepreneurs themselves. As a collective of technology entrepreneurs, they invest for the long term. They bring their capital, network, experience, and a hands-on mentality. They have eradicated all structural issues found in typical VC funds. In this partnership, your goals become theirs.

name: Investsud
description: Our raison d'être consists of taking an active part in well-being and well-being in Wallonia, through our ability to enable ambitious entrepreneurs to see bigger , to move faster, to register more easily in a sustainability approach. This intention can be summarized by the expression “ Amplifiers of Ambitions ”, the term amplifiers referring to the leverage effect generated by our action, and also to our ability to support numerous partners. Concretely, our vision is to invest financial resources but also to invest ourselves personally in order to enable our partner entrepreneurs to innovate, develop, and pass on their businesses.

name: Rise PropTech
description: They empower young promising companies to accelerate the transformation of the European construction and real estate industry. More than a strong financial partner, they provide startups with genuine business opportunities and hands-on support via their network of qualified and trusted partners in the industry.

name: V-Bio Ventures
description: They are a life sciences venture capital fund that helps transform scientific innovation into products that positively impact people’s lives. Their extensive network and expertise in the sector allow them to contribute more than just capital. They aim to be part of the DNA of the new ventures they back.
investmentAreas: Bio-Tech, Med-Tech, Deep-Tech, Health-Tech, Therapeurtics, Pharmaceutics, Food & Beverage

name: Inventures SA
description: At Inventures Investment Partners, they strongly believe the startup revolution is ongoing and fundamentally transforming the world. As innovators since 2011 in Impact Finance, they strive to build more responsible finance by selecting sustainable projects and creating strong financial and social measurable returns. Reconciling profitability and sustainability is not an option; it is a must if the next generations are to inherit and preserve the blue planet and humanity in harmony.
investmentAreas: Gov-Tech, Ed-Tech, Bio-Tech, Med-Tech, Green-Tech, Agnostic

name: Green Park Investment Partners
description: They have invested in small and medium-sized companies in the Benelux since 2010. They seek out inspirational entrepreneurs or management teams, and when they invest, they fully commit themselves.

name: Scale II
description: They accelerate growing startups. There is a missing opportunity between a successful start and achieved milestones. ScaleFund’s mission is to bridge this equity gap and boost promising companies.

name: Vives Louvain Technology Fund
description: VIVES is a seed capital fund initiated by UCLouvain which invests in companies developing disruptive innovations with a positive societal impact. For more than 15 years, VIVES has invested in companies active in all technological sectors.

name: LeanSquare
description: They are a specialized investment fund, recognized for their impact through supporting innovative projects. Through a relationship of trust and proximity, they mobilize their capital, knowledge, and network to help mature start-ups in their growth plans.

name: Theodorus III
description: Mostly dedicated to seed and early stage funding, Theodorus invests in Biotech, MedTech, Digital and Engineering applications. Theodorus has a priority access to ULB R&D outcome and spin-offs, but can also invest in projects outside ULB. The investment size varies from 250k€ (first investment) to 2.5M€ per company.

name: WING by Digital Wallonia
description: They focus on innovations and disruptive technologies such as artificial intelligence, the Internet of Things, SaaS software, blockchain technology, medtech, and augmented reality. They are here to help at different stages of development, via the W.IN.G. fund, through more significant investments, or by financing funds associated with these sectors.
investmentAreas: Deep-Tech, Augmented Reality, IoT, SaaS, Blockchain, Med-Tech,

name: Sambrinvest
description: Coming from a public-private partnership, they finance needs whether a start-up, a growing SME, or in the transfer phase. With more than 35 years of experience working alongside businesses and entrepreneurs, nearly 300 SMEs in its portfolio, and more than €200M under management, Sambrinvest plays a key role in the financing of venture capital in the Charleroi region, Belgium.
investmentAreas: Agnostic, Ag-Tech, Food & Beverage, Prop-Tech, Deep-Tech

name: KBC Focus Fund
description: With the KBC Focus Fund, they have the ambition to boost the sectors of nanotechnology, microelectronics, and IoT. They mainly focus on Belgium and surrounding countries where top expertise centers in these technological areas can be found. KBC is also invested in university spin-off funds such as Gemma Frisius Fund and Qbic, as well as in Imec.xpand. This allows them to have great insights into deal flow and potential new ventures.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: SFPIM
description: SFPIM aims to be a trusted partner and helps Belgian companies, well-established SMEs and scale-ups, to become benchmarks in their sector by offering them “smart capital solutions”. SFPIM also plays a significant role for the long-term stability of the Belgian economy. It contributes to the anchoring of strategic assets through “smart capital solutions” for already thriving or promising companies, or even ecosystems.
investmentAreas: Agnostic, Bio-Tech, Deep-Tech, Aviation, Ed-Tech, SaaS

name: Aconterra
description: They invest in early-stage technology companies driving building innovation and energy transition. They finance and support startups and scaleups that enhance building intelligence, energy efficiency, safety, and comfort. As an open-ended ‘evergreen fund,’ they focus on long-term value and impact. They serve as an ecosystem for their investors and portfolio companies, offering the expertise, network, and capital necessary to help achieve their goals.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence , Construction, Internet of Things, Real Estate, Sensor, Smart Building, Smart Home, Software

name: AMAVI Capital
description: AMAVI is a PropTech Investor with a Thorough Understanding of the Real Estate Industry and a Pan-European Network AMAVI is among the first movers and one of the very few later-stage investors focusing solely on this segment in Europe. AMAVI is a fully independent investment vehicle with a European network, established to support the growth of the leading and most promising scale-ups active in the PropTech industry.
investmentAreas: Building Material, Clean-Tech, Prop-Tech, Retail Technology, SaaS

name: Seeder Fund
description: Seeder Fund is a venture capital fund dedicated to accelerating the first financing rounds of promising digital entrepreneurs in Belgium and beyond. They make quick investment decisions, offer individualized support, and provide access to a large network. Additionally, they can double down in subsequent fundraisings. With their team of experienced entrepreneurs and investors, they are committed to helping entrepreneurs build solid foundations and successfully kickstart their ambitious growth journeys.

name: Biovision Ventures
description: They support innovative early-stage companies with a mission to translate groundbreaking science into transformative therapies. They focus on private companies in the US and Europe as key innovation hubs, with the goal of identifying global technological leaders regardless of their location.
investmentAreas: Life Sience, Health-Tech, Med-Tech, Therapeutics, Bio-IT

name: Bioqube Ventures
description: Bioqube Ventures is a specialist life sciences investment firm based in Europe with a global footprint. They source, finance, and develop innovative therapeutic assets and technologies. They leverage their venture creation experience to translate and de-risk scientific innovation, advancing their investment portfolio and maximizing value for investors.

name: Astanor Ventures
description: At Astanor, they are committed to driving positive change and creating meaningful impact across the entire agrifood value chain. Their impact creation model is built on a foundation of purpose-driven investments and measurable outcomes.
investmentAreas: Agriculture, AgTech, Farming, Food and Beverage, Information Technology,

name: Capricorn Partners
description: Capricorn Partners is a unique independent manager of venture capital, growth capital and quoted equity funds, with a focus on innovative companies that use technology as a competitive advantage.

name: Pitchdrive
description: Pitchdrive is an early-stage VC Run by Experienced Entrepreneurs. They back founders during their crazy startup ride. They support founders with the right execution mindset who turn good ideas into great companies.

name: Tioga Capital Partners
description: They focus on being the best European long-term partner to exceptional Web3 entrepreneurs. Their interest lies in the ‘picks and shovels’ of the industry, with a particular focus on DeFi infrastructure, NFT infrastructure, compliance, and applications that benefit from Web3’s composability features.

name: Volta Ventures
description: Investment is about building the future that lies ahead. Their investment opportunities are focused on AI because it drives the future of how machines, data, and technologies are being programmed. By channeling their deep domain expertise into identifying investment opportunities, they back AI companies with high potential to impact conventional industries or society.
investmentAreas: B2B Enterprise, SaaS, Fin-Tech, Health-Tech, Prop-Tech, Green-Tech, Gaming

name: Boundary Holding
description: Investment is about building the future that lies ahead. Their investment opportunities are focused on AI because it drives the future of how machines, data, and technologies are being programmed. By channeling their deep domain expertise into identifying investment opportunities, they back AI companies with high potential to impact conventional industries or society.

name: imec.xpand
description: imec.xpand is an independent global venture capital fund that focuses on transformative semiconductor and nanotechnology innovations where imec contributions can have a determining impact on the success of their technology development.

name: Hummingbird Ventures
description: Hummingbird Ventures is a global early stage venture capital fund backing outlier founders. They are global seed investors, looking for outlier founders. Hummingbird believes groundbreaking companies are built by a rare breed of entrepreneur.
investmentAreas: Health-Tech, Fin-Tech, Life Science, Therapeutics, Deep-Tech, Marketplace
